title: Rubicon Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Rubicon adapter

accountId.description: An ID which identifies the publisher's account

siteId.description: An ID which identifies the site selling the impression

zoneId.description: An ID which identifies the sub-section of the site where the impression is located

inventory.description: An object defining arbitrary targeting key/value pairs related to the page

visitor.description: An object defining arbitrary targeting key/value pairs related to the visitor

video.description: An object defining additional Rubicon video parameters

Language.description: Language of the ad - should match content video

PlayerHeight.description: Height in pixels of the video player

PlayerWidth.description: Width in pixels of the video player

VideoSizeID.description: Rubicon size_id, used to describe type of video ad (preroll, postroll, etc)

Skip.description: Can this ad be skipped ( 0 = no, 1 = yes)

SkipDelay.description: number of seconds until the ad can be skipped
